title: Do you have someone fun to play with?
content:
My game is a platform battle between Billy and Mort; right now it's only gonna work if you have two people on the same comp, using the same keyboard, with different buttons for keen and mort.

The question is, do you have someone available with whom you think you would have fun with playing such a game in such a way?

It is important for me to know, cuz im considerin internet play- .... . / ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.

title: Re: Do you have someone fun to play with?
content:
I do not have. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Do you have someone fun to play with?
Re: Do you have someone fun to play with?
content:
Nope. Maybe if I go to my Uncle's... He was a true Keener. Went out of it a bit though.

But generally no. I expect you to add internet play to this. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Do you have someone fun to play with?
content:
you expect me to? dont expect it, i cant promise it, but i'l prolly try.
since i have the keen enigine, i can make any game with it; i'll prolly make a nice 1 player rpg of keen too, and there was another game i had in mind, but i cant remember it right now.- .... . / ..- -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.

title: Re: Do you have someone fun to play with?
content:
I'm sure I could rustle up a companion. I did spend several hours the other night playing Starfox with friends (and none of this "64" stuff either).________________
